Withers is an NPC in Baldur's Gate 3 (BG3). Withers can be found at Dank Crypt. Withers is a mysterious and terrifying Skeleton that joins your camp after you either first meet him or after a short while. There is a massive amount of NPCs in Baldur's Gate 3, and their ideals, needs and way of living are strictly related to the actions they perform during the course of the game.
